section.title: Examine the loop device
section.para: Look back at where I ran these commands against my actual disk drive (/dev/sda) and you'll see the results are quite similar.

listitem.para: file detects loop0 as a block special device.
fdisk no longer says we need to set the cylinders.

section.para: Our virtual disk is starting to look like a real hard drive now!
To bring this section to a conclusion we'll create a partition, format it with ext3, and then mount it for reading and writing.
